name: Break The Brick
description:
Destroy all of the green blocks to advance to the next level. You will have to navigate mazes of deadly blocks, confusing switches, and secret doors to find all of the green blocks. 

This game is still very far from being done, however, all of the game's base mechanics are complete, it just needs more levels, a functioning settings screen with volume control, and possibly a level select. Many art, sound, music and name changes are to be expected. Please tell me what you think in the comments.
